name: Element (itch) (Anthony wong)
description:
Element King:

Control:

Move  -  Left Click 

Cast Ability- Right click (In element King, you need to combine element to cast a skill )

Element List:

Fire - Q                      Water- W

Natural - E              Holy - A

Arcane - S               Shield- D

Special element:

Earth = Natural + Arcane (E+S)   Heal = Natural + Holy (E+A)

Some element have opposite Attributes will cancel each other:

Fire and water

Holy and Arcane

Menu - Esc               Turn the view: Hold the mouse middle button and move

Zoom in zoom out: scroller
